channel.title: jira.namics.com
channel.description: An XML representation of a search request

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4851] Test DE Atos // No availability information
item.description:
On the detail page of 101010 product, the availability is loading and loading. Nothing happends.

I tested with the test computer, Google Chrome 36.0
item.summary: Test DE Atos // No availability information

status.description: Change Request/Bug was approved by customer, CR/Bug can be implemented/fixed

attachment.name: 2014-08-19 09_58_30-Laborkabel ø 4 mm rot 100 cm kaufen _ Distrelec Deutschland.png
attachment.author: oilie

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4741] IF-11 OrderCalculation Error - Partners from account group 0004 are not permitted for partner function SH
item.description:
When adding any product to the cart the IF-11 order calculation is returning this error:

SAP ERR:VPD,000 :Partners from account group 0004 are not permitted for partner function SH

In the attachment the full xml log.
item.summary: IF-11 OrderCalculation Error - Partners from account group 0004 are not permitted for partner function SH

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
Hi Francesco,

According SAP configuration, the ship-to you specified is not allowed to be used as ship-to. I will send a mail with you in CC to Patricia for checks from functional point of view.

Best Regards,
Ligia

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4754] Test DE Atos - Order History does not contain order from 07.08 or 08.08
item.description:
please see the print screen from SAP (all orders placed in the last 2 days)

and the print screen from webshop and print screen from SAP
item.summary: Test DE Atos - Order History does not contain order from 07.08 or 08.08

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Orders 07.08.14 & 08.08.14 for customer: 1241009 can be seen in the print screen from SAP system.

Hi Oana,

Yes this is true. This is pagination problem. we have 33 results for that page and the page is displaying only 11 out of that.
That's why we are missing those record. We need pagination link below to display those missing record as they are number 32 place.

Thanks.
Here is the response without pagination :-

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4682] IF-05 Customer type punchout interface change
item.description:
The IF-05 for customer type punchout will not longer include the information about the sales org, because if a punchout is available for a customer type, than this is applied globally.

Solution:

  • Create a new type DistPunchOutFilterSalesOrg extending DistPunchOutFilter
  • Delete the existing relation between DistPunchOutFilter and DistSalesOrg
  • Create a new relation between DistPunchOutFilterSalesOrg and DistSalesOrg
item.summary: IF-05 Customer type punchout interface change

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4847] Test DE aTOS // No product can be added to cart
item.description:
For all products that I try to add to the cart, I receive this message.

please check,
item.summary: Test DE aTOS // No product can be added to cart

status.description: This issue is being actively worked on at the moment by the assignee.
